summary: The document is a segment of the JFK Assassination System Identification Form, dated 01/20/98, detailing an investigation into David Reed Fromer, a DOD-affiliated personnel incident. It outlines a request for a file check from the FBI in Chicago, Illinois, concerning Fromer, with the results received on 10 January 1967. The document, marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED', was released with deletions on 03/07/95 and involves Special Agent Gordon R. Tyler from the 113th MI GP (I).
key_findings: The document is related to the JFK Assassination System and focuses on an investigation into David Reed Fromer.
A file check regarding Fromer was requested from the FBI in Chicago, Illinois, with the results attached as an exhibit.
Marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED', the document was released with deletions.
Special Agent Gordon R. Tyler from the 113th MI GP (I) is linked to the report.
